name: Alexander Shulgin
title: Our Notes
knownFor: Synthesis of MDMA and hundreds of novel psychoactive compounds
contributions: Authored *PiHKAL* and *TiHKAL* with Anne Shulgin; mapped the effects of consciousness-altering molecules
bio: Shulgin's fearless navigation of molecular terrain inspires our data models, pharmacobotany research, and our belief in neurodiversity as a design principle.
